title: Wang Chiropractic & Acupuncture Clinic | Elmhurst, IL
description: We specialize in acupuncture, massage therapy, and other natural healing methods. Founded in 1999. 20+ years of experience. We accept insurance.
cleaned_text: Treatment | Insurance Accepted 20+ Years of Experience Drug-Free Treatment Insurance Accepted We can help you find relief from various health issues with our expert services. Relieve that knot in your back with the professional massage therapy services we offer at Wang Chiropractic & Acupuncture Clinic. Leave sun damage and wrinkles behind, and restore your natural glow when you take advantage of our non-invasive microdermabrasion services. When you're looking for natural, drug-free treatment options for pain and other symptoms in the Elmhurst, IL, area, Wang Chiropractic & Acupuncture Clinic is here for you. We have 20+ years of experience you can trust and rely on to relieve pain and restore your body back to optimal health. We take a personalized, whole-body approach to wellness that promotes the body's natural recuperative processes. We're committed to giving gentle chiropractic care and dedicated to providing you and your family with the best care possible. Call us today to learn more or to schedule an appointment, Founded in 1999, Wang Chiropractic & Acupuncture Clinic is a local, woman-owned health center in the Elmhurst, IL, area. Our main goal is to help you achieve maximum whole-body wellness levels. For your convenience, we accept insurance and offer same-day appointments when available.
